## jsx.withImgAttrs() function

Returns a function that generates HTML attributes for an `<img>` tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function withImgAttrs(options: ImgAttrsOptions): (
  yoot: Yoot,
  overrideOptions?: ImgAttrsOptions,
) => {
  [x: `data-${string}`]: NonNullable<Maybe<import('./types').Primitive>> | undefined;
  src: string;
  width?: number | undefined;
  height?: number | undefined;
  alt?: string | undefined;
  crossOrigin?: NonNullable<'' | 'anonymous' | 'use-credentials' | null | undefined> | undefined;
  decoding?: NonNullable<Maybe<'auto' | 'async' | 'sync'>> | undefined;
  fetchPriority?: NonNullable<Maybe<'auto' | 'high' | 'low'>> | undefined;
  loading?: NonNullable<Maybe<'eager' | 'lazy'>> | undefined;
  referrerPolicy?:
    | NonNullable<
        | ''
        | 'no-referrer'
        | 'no-referrer-when-downgrade'
        | 'origin'
        | 'origin-when-cross-origin'
        | 'same-origin'
        | 'strict-origin'
        | 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin'
        | 'unsafe-url'
        | null
        | undefined
      >
    | undefined;
  sizes?: string | undefined;
  srcset?: string | undefined;
  title?: string | undefined;
  style?: Record<string, string | number> | undefined;
  'aria-label'?: string | undefined;
  'aria-labelledby'?: string | undefined;
  'aria-describedby'?: string | undefined;
  'aria-hidden'?: NonNullable<Maybe<boolean | 'true' | 'false'>> | undefined;
};
```

**Returns:**

(yoot: [Yoot](./yoot.yoot.md)<!-- -->, overrideOptions?: [ImgAttrsOptions](./yoot.jsx.imgattrsoptions.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; { \[x: \`data-${string}\`\]: NonNullable&lt;Maybe&lt;import("./types").Primitive&gt;&gt; \| undefined; src: string; width?: number \| undefined; height?: number \| undefined; alt?: string \| undefined; crossOrigin?: NonNullable&lt;"" \| "anonymous" \| "use-credentials" \| null \| undefined&gt; \| undefined; decoding?: NonNullable&lt;Maybe&lt;"auto" \| "async" \| "sync"&gt;&gt; \| undefined; fetchPriority?: NonNullable&lt;Maybe&lt;"auto" \| "high" \| "low"&gt;&gt; \| undefined; loading?: NonNullable&lt;Maybe&lt;"eager" \| "lazy"&gt;&gt; \| undefined; referrerPolicy?: NonNullable&lt;"" \| "no-referrer" \| "no-referrer-when-downgrade" \| "origin" \| "origin-when-cross-origin" \| "same-origin" \| "strict-origin" \| "strict-origin-when-cross-origin" \| "unsafe-url" \| null \| undefined&gt; \| undefined; sizes?: string \| undefined; srcset?: string \| undefined; title?: string \| undefined; style?: Record&lt;string, string \| number&gt; \| undefined; 'aria-label'?: string \| undefined; 'aria-labelledby'?: string \| undefined; 'aria-describedby'?: string \| undefined; 'aria-hidden'?: NonNullable&lt;Maybe&lt;boolean \| "true" \| "false"&gt;&gt; \| undefined; }

A function that accepts a `Yoot` object and returns HTML `<img>` attributes.

## Remarks

Merges provided attributes with derived ones. Supports fallback for `alt`<!-- -->.
